revision.text:
<!--신문_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Newspaper
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = title }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 원어명 | ontologyProperty = title }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 종류 | ontologyProperty = type }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 판형 | ontologyProperty = format }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 소유주 | ontologyProperty = owner }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출판사 | ontologyProperty = publisher }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 편집장 | ontologyProperty = chiefEditor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 편집차장 | ontologyProperty = associateEditor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 편집국장 | ontologyProperty = managingEditor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 주필 | ontologyProperty = editor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 창간 | ontologyProperty = foundingDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 언어 | ontologyProperty = language }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 본사 | ontologyProperty = headquarter }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 발행 부수 | ontologyProperty = circulation }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 자매지 | ontologyProperty = sisterNewspaper }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = ISSN | ontologyProperty = issn }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = OCLC | ontologyProperty = oclc }}

end}}
